fields.Description/Abstract: Nurturing the Nurse Educator: Self-care & creating calm with Mindfulness:  This presentation will include an introduction to Nurse Educator role stress and the need for self-care and nurturing in everyday life and work. Dr. Marty Downey Marty will review research, application, limits and benefits of mindfulness related to mental, emotional and physical responses to stress and implications for use in Nurse Educator role with evidence-based practice applications.  Practical techniques for managing the multiple stressors in the role of Nurse Educator with mindfulness, mind-body-spirit complementary therapies will be provided with interactive participation.  You will learn practical strategies for mindful self-care and relaxation techniques that you may indulge in for personal and professional practice.
